title: MCP 677 | Horana | Commercial Land | for | Sale
details:
8.8 Acre Land Situated in close proximity to Horana Industrial Zone, Ideal location for commercial and agricultural purpose!

*15 Minutes to Kahathuduwa Southern Expressway Interchange
*20 Minutes to Diyagama Mahinda Rajapakse Stadium and ITUM constructed by ICC
*30 Minutes to Kottawa Southern Expressway Interchange
